root.name: Mirai Nikki: The 13th Diary Holder
root.description: The Story:In Mirai Nikki, 12 Diary Holders are forced to battle in a huge Battle Royal: The Survival Game. Formed by Deus, God of time and space, the survival game includes 12 normal people who get gifted with the power to see the future for up to 90 days in advance. However, this causes all of them to fail one way or another as the Diary and the person become one, meaning that destroying the Diary, also destroys the existence of the holder.

similar_games.game: Mirai Nikki RE: WRITE - 13 Ninme No Nikki Shoyuusha
